name: Mechanical Playground
description:
🎮 Controller recommended 🎮

Mechanical Playground is an action-platformer inspired by "Super Meat Boy" and "Hollow Knight".

It contains 18 skills and you can select 6 of them to make your own build.

Want to move like a ninja? Or maybe blow up everything in front of you? Are you one of those who prefer defensive tactics? Or even want to pick a little bit of each style? In this game you can express yourself however you want!
